name: Galaxy's Extreme
description:
Galaxy's Extreme is a futuristic spaceship racing game, inspired by classic 90's success racing games like F-Zero, Top Gear and also inspired by Horizon Chase Turbo. Explore the extremes of the galaxy, be the fastest, go over 2000 km/h and have fun!

Reinvented retro look
Galaxy's Extreme's stylized look is a mix of retro and modern graphics that results in a fantastic and unique atmosphere.

Arcade mode
Beat your opponents in 4 tracks with extreme and different landscapes, complete racing groups in the 3 game difficulties and unlock new ships to race.

Campaign mode
Campaign mode is under development and will be released in the future. We've planned for the campaign mode several events to win, unlockable upgrades to increase ship performance and customizable setup to do ship performance tweaks such as acceleration, maximum speed and handling.

Music and sound effects
The game's music mixes the classic with the modern and the sound effects provide the necessary immersion to make the game fun and exciting.

Game content
  • Arcade mode with 12 races to beat and each track has an average duration of 3-4 minutes.
  • 4 tracks divided by bronze and silver groups.
  • 3 difficulties.
  • 6 ships, 4 of them are unlockable.
  • Customize ship colors.
